meanings.definition: The act of adding or increasing something.
meanings.sent1: Her plussage of sprinkles on the cupcake made it extra special.
meanings.sent2: The plussage of decorations on the tree made it look festive.
meanings.sent3: The plussage of whipped cream on his hot cocoa made him smile.
meanings.sent4: Her plussage of enthusiasm to the team boosted their morale.
meanings.sent5: The plussage of colors in the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: The result of adding or increasing something.
meanings.sent1: The plussage of ingredients in the recipe made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The plussage of points on the scoreboard secured their victory.
meanings.sent3: The plussage of presents under the tree delighted the children.
meanings.sent4: The plussage of savings in her account gave her peace of mind.
meanings.sent5: The plussage of flowers in the garden brightened up the yard.
